analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 23.38. Ajjhattārammaṇattika, Kusalattika🔽Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na ajjhatta ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paccayā ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha
translated: .. The internal object triad, the wholesome triad🔽With internal object and not wholesome as condition, an internal object and wholesome consciousness arises, by way of root condition. (In brief.) With root as condition, six … With ignorance as condition, six … With no condition, six.

original: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na ajjhatta ārammaṇam na akusalam dhammam paccayā ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha
translated: With internal object and not wholesome as condition, an internal object and unwholesome consciousness arises, by way of root condition. (In brief.) With root as condition, six … With ignorance as condition, six … With no condition, six.
